data.name: Money by Afterpay Savings Account
data.description: The Money by Afterpay Savings Account is an account for putting money aside and pays you interest.

features.additionalInfo: You can access your accounts through Money on your mobile for all your online banking.
Unlimited transfers between your Money savings and Money daily accounts.
Savings accounts accept deposits only over the NPP network
All statements, notifications and other communications will be delivered electronically over email, text message and in-app notifications
Funds can only be withdrawn by transferring to a Money daily account
You cannot receive international payments into your Money savings account

eligibility.additionalInfo: We can’t open accounts in joint names, with multiple signatories, or under a Power of Attorney.  The product is currently not available to organisations.
You must be an Australian resident who is at least 18 years old.
You must have an Australian mobile number and a valid email address.

To open a Money by Afterpay Savings Account you must have a Money by Afterpay Daily Account. Your Money savings account can only make transfers to your Money daily account but can accept deposits. You can hold a maximum of 15 savings accounts in your name.
To open an account, you will need to download, register and activate your Money by Afterpay app.

depositRates.additionalInfo: Interest is calculated daily and applied monthly on the 1st day of the followng month.
